pages.about-us: About TideTouch - Elevating Lifestyles with Unmatched Laundry Solutions TideTouch HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT About TideTouch At TideTouch, we are passionate about delivering top-notch laundry solutions that redefine convenience and quality. With years of experience in the industry, we have mastered the art of garment care, utilizing advanced technology and eco-friendly practices to ensure your clothes are treated with the utmost care. Our mission is simple: to simplify your laundry routine and elevate your experience. Whether you're a busy professional, a parent with a hectic schedule, or simply someone who values their time, TideTouch is here to lighten your load and provide you with impeccably clean and fresh-smelling clothes. From pickup to delivery, we prioritize customer satisfaction and strive to exceed your expectations at every step. Experience the TideTouch difference today and discover a new level of convenience in laundry care. »TRANSFORM YOUR LAUNDRY ROUTINE WITH TIDETOUCH« SCHEDULE YOUR PICKUP ONLINE → CONVENIENTLY LOCATED TIDETOUCH LAUNDRY SERVICE CENTER 134, Road No. 7, Ayyappa Society, Mega Hills, Madhapur, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081, India Service Hours Monday - Sunday: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM TRANSFORM YOUR LAUNDRY EXPERIENCE TIDETOUCH - Expert Laundry Solutions At TideTouch, we are committed to revolutionizing your laundry routine. With cutting-edge technology and personalized care, we ensure your garments are impeccably cleaned and cared for. Your satisfaction is our priority as we strive to elevate your laundry experience to new heights of convenience and quality. SUSTAINABLE LAUNDRY PRACTICES ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY APPROACH Experience eco-friendly laundry with our commitment to sustainability. We utilize energy-efficient machines and eco-friendly detergents to minimize our environmental footprint. With TideTouch, you can trust that your laundry is being handled with care for both your clothes and the planet. The TideTouch website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. pages.privacy-policy: TideTouch - Your Privacy Matters to Us TideTouch HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT Privacy Policy TideTouch respects the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting your personal information. **Information We Collect:** We may collect the following information from you: Contact information: such as your name, email address, and phone number. Usage data: We may collect information about how you use our website, such as the pages you visit and the links you click. **How We Use Your Information:** We may use your information for the following purposes: To provide and improve our website and services. To send you information about our products and services. To personalize your experience on our website. **Sharing Your Information:** We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as necessary to fulfill your requests or for legal reasons. **Your Choices:** You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. **Security:** We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. **Changes to This Privacy Policy:** We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page. The TideTouch website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline TideTouch About Us Services Contact Us TEL: +91-855-509-2309 Legal Notices Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
